response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I suggest we discuss a fair price that reflects both its worth and your needs. I propose an offer of $140 for the product. This price allows me to maintain a reasonable profit while ensuring you receive a high-quality item that meets your expectations. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 140}
